review:
most of the patients visiting dental clinic will not be aware with suggestions being suggested by the doctor since they would her a lot in medical terms which they might not be aware of.** ***** ** **** ******** *** convincing if the patient treated diagnosis can be documented and shared with the patient as what the problem was and what would have been the worst in case if the patient avoid treatment.

considering the approach and treatment procedure is satisfactory.

context: Fixed Partial Denture (FPD),Oral Surgery Procedures,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: I came to know about the clinic from my friends. the moment when I spoke to her about my oral condition she informed me and the next day I met Dr goutham and today here I am writing an review for Dr goutham and his clinics.I came with a complaint of pain and an huge swelling on my left side of face.treatment started immediately and I was attended by specialist.I thank Dr goutham and his staff.I would recommend my family members and friends .

I came to know about this hospital through my friends. the treatment is good ,the doctor is so genuine and explained clearly about the treatment at each and every step. the costing is also reasonable. I would recommend this hospital to my friends and family members personally.now after my removal of braces I am laughing more cause I am getting more compliments.

I was so scared for the removal of the teeth as I had a very bad experiences before ... but Dr Gowtham has explained me the treatment with lots of patience and gave confidence .. and I was ready for the tooth removal ... and the treatment went well and was so happy .

context: Zirconia Crowns,Oral Surgery Procedures,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: Dr goutham has done a very good job.I m very happy with my treatment which was completed in a short span of time with a economical costs which is very rare to be found now a days.I thank Dr gowtham and team for a great work . and for a new smile ... I recommend all my friends and family members .

Dr. goutham was very friendly and polite the ambiance of the clinic was good along with the remaining staff  were good.the treatment was done at the time and cost was genuine.so what I personally say is I m satisfied with the treatment along with doctor including the cost
Very polite and kind doctor, available 24/7 for the help, moreover what surprised me is he receives the calls himself and guides the patient for immediate relief. Amazing experience
I known hospital by online search on first I had a word with doctor my problem elevated and visited to the site and got good treatment Nice hospitality
it was a really a good experience .the treatment was done on time the staff was really helpful. Dr goutham is really a genuine guy.I personally recommend Dr. Gowtham to my family and friends.
Treatment was good, doctor was very supportive and coordinating, Hence I'm recommending my friend to do his dental treatment here
